scripts.cdk-diff: tsc --build && cross-env odmd_build_id=sampleSpringOpenAPI3cdk odmd_rev_ref=b..master-_b..ta cdk diff * --profile sandbox-workspace2
scripts.cdk-deploy: tsc --build && cross-env odmd_build_id=sampleSpringOpenAPI3cdk odmd_rev_ref=b..master-_b..ta cdk deploy * --parameters ContractsShareInNow=1722306756967  --require-approval never -v --profile sandbox-workspace2
scripts.cdk-ls: tsc --build && cross-env odmd_build_id=sampleSpringOpenAPI3cdk odmd_rev_ref=b..master-_b..ta cdk ls --profile sandbox-workspace2
